data.title: Inglês - Nonos Anos
data.meta_description: Inglês - nonos anos - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Edgar Allan Poe was born in 1809 in Boston, Massachusetts. He was an orphan at age 3 after his parents died. He attended the University of Virginia and enlisted in the US Army. In 1836, he married his cousin Virginia who was 13 years old. She died of tuberculosis in 1847 at age 24, overwhelming Poe with grief. Poe worked as a writer, poet, critic and editor until his death in 1849. He is best known for his evocative short stories and poems that captured readers' imaginations worldwide.
